name: The Legend of Zelda: A New Light
description: This hack provides a new quest for the Legend of Zelda (NES). It changes many parts of the game while staying true to the original. It features brand new graphics and new dungeons. All level entrances have been relocated, secrets in the overworld are moved, and there are many overworld surprises.

name: The Junuary Project
description:
A hack that tries to implement as many pre-release and prototype assets into SM64, With some extra polish.

Experience the stars of January ‘96, and explore long forgotten test stages. Race against Blargg, toss back at Ice Motos, and unlock the Yellow Switch.

Utilize old and forgotten moves such as Squat Kick, SSK Sideflip, Dashing and JumpStep3.

name: Fire Emblem: Binding Blade Plus
description:
The goal of this project is to take all the amazing hacks from the Fire Emblem GBA hacking community and put them into the base game experience. These are designed for veteran players and newcomers alike! The changes are designed to be uncontroversial enough so that this isn’t seen as an “alternate” way to play the game but an “enhanced” way. The major changes are QOL and bugfixes. The only gameplay changes come from removing localization changes.

Here are the changes present in all versions:

Adds Casual Mode
Unlocks Hard Mode at start
Prevent Misheal bug
Fimbulvetr glitch fix

name: Golden Axe Plus
description:
A mod for Golden Axe (Genesis) with many QOL improvements, such as:

Use any magic with any character (Thunder, Explosion, Fire)
New Options( Continues, Difficulty, Magic modes, life bar refill bug )
New Graphics( Font , HUD, Go arrow)
New Character Select Screen (Improved Graphics, Better Magic selection, Added fire sprites from arcade ver)
Both Players can pick the same character

description: The clicking adventure you and your friends need. Eat melons with the main hero of the game The Dino R and eat all the meat in the world!

name: Caverns of Mars: Recharged
description: Race through caverns while blasting away enemies and terrain to reach the depths of Mars in this reimagining of the 1981 classic.

name: Fairy Village
description: Meet the thumblings! They are teeny magical folk wandering the land in search of a home. Help them wander no more! Deep inside Fae Forest, a perfect oasis has presented itself, it's time to settle and make roots!

name: Mask of Lion
description:
Become a masked hero and experience exhilarating battle action!
Experience the game's intuitive tap combo battle controls!
Join with heroes from around the globe to defeat a group of monsters trying to conquer the world.

name: GeoChampion
description:
Welcome to Geo Champion.
Do you like challenges?
Try to become the world champion of geography by answering the 640 quiz while visiting the 160 countries of the world.
Country name, Capitals, their location, Areas, Population, Flags, nothing will be secret for you anymore!

name: Idle Game Tycoon
description: Have you ever dreamed of building up a successful games company and launching your own games? This simulation is set in the exciting and creative games development business – establish a successful company, build up your own development studio from a garage firm to a highly profitable company, create fantastic games, publish them, and make a mint. Employ managers who will help you, and optimize the way you work within your company. Research new technologies and genres to keep up with the major players and support your developers so they can further improve their performance and develop the best games. Enhance the creative play area with a whole host of playful items and decorate the offices just as you wish to give them your own personal touch.

name: Enigma Express: Hidden Objects
description: As a rookie at the Blue Toad detective agency, you are joining renowned detective Hannah Dakota on the case of a lifetime. Together you'll travel the world visiting stunning locations and challenging your sleuthing skills as you put an end to this wild goose chase in a hidden object mystery you'll never forget!

name: SynthRunner
description: In this futuristic urban environement, you are jumping from one building to another, slide under doors and pipes while performing parkour moves to run as fast as possible.

name: M Doll
description: A doll falls into a dark world inside an interactive full length film. You can JUMP from any scene in the film to an interactive 3d version of the scene and back! Experience a film in an entirely new way. Available in DVD++ and VHS++

name: Skyfighter Arcade
description: SkyFighter Arcade harkens back to the classic top-down shoot-em-up vertical scrollers, with modern day rogue-like twists. Test your reaction and maneuvering skills by blasting enemies out of the sky. Upgrade your Skyfighter and customize your loadout with upgradeable weapons and combo attacks.

name: Tamerlane
description: 2D-top-down shooter focused on avoiding your enemies and defeating them from a distance. Experience real historical combat of the medieval ages taking you through Europe, the Middle East and India. Encounter a wide range of enemies requiring you to master the art of mounted archery.

name: Breu: Shadow Hunt
description: A thriller interactive-fiction audio game. Run from creatures in a grid based fashion style in this 'choose your own adventure' game. Embark on a treasure hunt to help Marco finding his missing grandfather.

name: Bazooka Cat: First Episode
description: Bazooka Cat is a lovingly crafted platform game inspired by the old school games of the 90s with new technologies.The game takes place in a sci-fi fictional world somewhere on the edge of the universe. The story tells about the difficult fate of the cat Lucky and the robotic assistant M.U.R

name: Don't Screw Up!
description:
Let me show you a minimalistic game «Don`t screw up!». Whether you are looking for something serious or just want to kill some time by tap and swipe, this game is simple and addictive from the very first minute. Want to play? First, let me tell you something.
Do you think you can handle mocking and cruelty? Want to play nasty or want to play nice? It’s your choice. I’m just the moderator, a real sweet-pea, an occasionally cranky game-minder, a vicious, teeth-baring attack-dog… neatly rolled into one.

name: Flarts
description: Take aim and launch your Flarts (Flying Darts!) through precision based, obstacle-filled levels. Pop piñatas and aim for a bullseye on the Flartboard. Stretch your thumbs and jump into this quick and quirky arcade-style game. Controls are simple, but Flarts is sure to challenge!

name: Gods & Civilization: Ragnarok
description: Ragnarok has started, the gods are in utter dismay and the divine world calls for the aid of a new Hero, you. Are you prepared to fight for world domination? Will you be the one to save what little remains of this world and make it your own, conquering the divine and mortal alike?

name: Haywire Hospital
description:
As Chief Administrator of Haywire Hospital, you’ll need to hire the galaxy’s best doctors to cure the galaxy’s wildest illnesses! On top of that, you’ll be rolling in coins, butter and sardines. How marvelous!

In addition, we’ll help you find the love of your dreams and achieve your life’s greatest goals!

name: Fishing Superstars
description: Sin descripción

name: Phoenix!
description: Tap the screen to move phoenix stay away from obstacles!

name: Epic Racers
description:
Welcome to the world of Epic Racers, the newest game from the team behind the popular Tap the Frog series!
Prepare for new and exciting underwater adventure as you help Rocky the Gecko become the greatest submarine racer ever!
Build your very own racing submarine, enhance it with numerous upgrades and challenge the best underwater racers of all time!

name: Granblue Fantasy: Versus - Seox
description: "Seox" is a DLC for use with Granblue Fantasy: Versus.

name: Hood Warfare
description: Welcome to Detroit. Gang violence has become an epidemic, forcing all civilians and police to leave the city. All that remains are soldiers of the Bloods and Crips. The city has become an abandoned battlefield where gangs engage in large scale firefights known as "Hood Warfare".

name: Tetris Illuminated Mega Screen
description: Tetris Illuminated Mega Screen is a dedicated handheld game created by Techno Source.

name: Arcade Bank 3 Minute Tetris
description:
Arcade Bank 3 minute Tetris is a miniature arcade piggy bank which takes 100 yen coins to play.

Along with the main 3 minute mode typically known as ultra, it also has 40 lines and marathon.

name: Arcade Game Piggy Bank: Atari Breakout
description: This piggy bank is shaped like an arcade machine, and it even lets you play a mini-arcade game every time you insert a coin.

name: Brain Tester: Mind trick quiz
description:
This Game Is About Riddles and Mind Trick Questions .
Challenging Question that will trick your brain to get wrong answer.

Coming with 4(?) Choices of answers that will Help you beat the game

name: Metroid Dread
description:
Metroid Dread is a cancelled DS game for the Metroid series that was later reworked into the Nintendo Switch game of the same name. The game is notable for being in development hell, having been originally developed for the Nintendo DS. This early version of the game has never been publicly shown off.

This early version has the same basic premise as the final one, with Samus trapped on an alien world, trying to survive against an unstoppable foe. And as it's a sequel to Metroid Fusion, it presumably would have carried the plot point of Samus being on the run from the Galactic Federation.

No prototype builds or ROMs have ever surfaced for this DS version, and it is unlikely Nintendo will release any. It's a possibility that concept art or screenshots of this early version will be revealed in the upcoming art book, as Nintendo is open to talking about Metroid Dread's development history.

Liam Robertson of Unseen64 claims that a synopsis of the game was given out to select members of the press. And in 2010, IGN's Craig Harris said in a podcast that he had seen a complete script for Metroid Dread, and that "Nintendo could use it anytime they wanted." It's possible that this was the synopsis that Liam Robertson was referring to. After the 2021 announcement of the game, Harris was asked on Twitter if he remembered anything from this script. He said he didn't

name: Pokémon Eternal X
description: Eternal X & Wilting Y are difficulty/catch 'em all hacks; all Pokémon are obtainable in all versions of the games, trade evolutions are optional and they are more difficult than the base games. Both EX and WY come in four versions: the Legal Version makes useful Hidden Abilities easily available, and adds many egg and tutor moves to almost every Pokémon's level up moves, all of which are legal in the official games. The Rebalanced Version includes all of these changes, as well as many base stat, type and movepool changes intended to make weaker Pokémon more fun to use. The third version available is Insanity Mode; this is essentially the Rebalanced Version with more challenging Trainer battles. Finally, the Online Version of the hack sacrifices a few features to make every Pokemon you catch legal, and can be used to play online.

name: The Night Before Star Wars
description: To Save Spacemas, you must fly across the planet and collect all the neccesary components, while shootering the empire along the way!

name: Akari: School Trip
description: Akari: School Trip is an immersive, action-packed adventure game based on a popular Japanese manga. As the player guides Akari, a courageous school girl, through a mysterious and dangerous world.

name: Gaop
description: Use the up, down, left and right buttons to control the player to push the box to the designated position to pass the level. If you want to restart the level, please long press Left Control. If you want to quit the game, please long press ESC.

name: Remedium: Sentinels
description: Remedium: Sentinels is an auto-shooter with rogue-lite elements set in a grim post-apocalyptic world, where The Grey Plague turned most humans into vicious mutant freaks. Play as a a steel Sentinel and defend the cities against the endless hordes of mutants until your reactor dies!

name: Boom Adventures
description: Grab a duck and hit enemy! This is the primary goal of the game :) There are two game modes. Campaign and survival. In both you can challenge your friends to check who is best duckthrower.

name: Donut or Cookie
description: Donut or Cookie is a side-view physics puzzle game. The player needs to toss a pink donut or cookie into the customer's bag. you can choose a donut or a cookie, they have 2 shapes, a circle and a square, this is actively used in solving puzzles.

name: The Sword and the Fish
description: The Sword and the Fish is an RPG Maker 2000 game created by Joel and Tyler Minty.

name: Grand Theft Auto Re: Liberty City Stories
description: Grand Theft Auto Re: Liberty City Stories (or Re:LCS) was a total conversion mod for Grand Theft Auto: Vice City and an unofficial PC port of the PlayStation 2 version of Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories featuring improved graphics and native support for widescreen, XInput controllers, and keyboard & mouse. Development on this unofficial PC port began in 2017 and continued until 2021 when the developer decided to cancel the project and remove all official download links following a wave of anti-GTA modding actions from Take-Two Interactive.

name: Trade Bots: A Technical Analysis Simulation
description: Trade Bots is an educational simulation game featuring technical analysis and algorithmic trading. Decide when to buy or sell an unknown stock based solely on patterns and technical indicators. As your profit increases, unlock upgrades that help expedite and automate gameplay with bots.

name: Project Sphinx
description: In this first-person puzzle-solving game, you're a robot with a mission on a space station. And like any great robot, you're going to have to explore, teleport and ricochet your way around the base, in which each room and corridor is a puzzle to solve.

name: Cyber Courier 2088
description: Cyber Courier 2088 is a cyberpunk sci-fi courier game, where you start out as a taxi driver transporting passengers and goods as you become a sought-after cyber courier in a crazy low-poly Sci-Fi world.

name: Path of a Player
description: This Game is loosely based on Solo Leveling

name: Rogue Station
description: A space station builder simulation roguelite. Fight off enemy ships, fleets and rival stations, build and upgrade your station, hire and manage your crew. Survive as long as you can.

name: Subliminal
description: Subliminal is a psychological horror/puzzle game inspired by the urban legend of The Backrooms. Bleeding edge of lighting and rendering, handcrafted open-ended levels, light and perspective-based puzzles, nostalgic spaces, unfamiliar faces, and a rotting feeling that something is not quite right...

name: Dungeons and Myths 2
description: "Dungeons and Myths 2" is a 2D tower defence game with a roguelike element. Place traps and monsters to defend your dungeon, pick upgrade after every wave of enemies! New enemies and new defence tactics!

name: Battle of Vukovar: Rain of Steel
description: Join the historic battle for Vukovar at the end of the 20th century through multiplayer combat. Play in teams choosing one of the five modes or outside the team in a free for all mode. Accomplish your goals using real weapons from the war while moving through an accurate simulation of the city map

name: The Backrooms Experiment
description: The Backrooms Experience is a co-op walking simulator with horror and thriller elements. Find your way in Backrooms, avoid the entities, cheese entities with voices, explore the levels, cooperate with your friends, and most importantly, do not die.

name: Silhouette
description: Silhouette is a cozy puzzle VR game that tasks the player with helping little shadow creatures (the Shadowies) through 28 puzzles. It uses hand tracking (no controllers) to let you cast shadows, manipulate the Shadowie's environment and interact with objects.

name: Road 96: Mile 0
description: The prequel to Road 96. Play Zoe and Kaito where it all started. Challenge your beliefs!

name: Get Dumped
description: Get Dumped by Arashi! You are Michi, a rather lame high school girl who has the perfect boyfriend. But suddenly he decides to dump you! When he agrees to go on one last date with you, you'll have to work hard to get him back!

name: Minecraft: Legends - Deluxe Edition
description: Includes the base game and six additional skins.

name: Perseverance: Complete Edition
description: Persevere through family troubles, small-town drama, and… zombie apocalypse as Jack and Karen in Perseverance: Complete Edition!

name: Chain Car Stunt Simulator: 3D Extreme Highway Car Driving Games
description: This is the latest gaming attraction with all new car racing mania adventure in town. So be prepared to break the chain, as it is a real challenge and test of your core driving skills.

name: Animal Super Craft: Maker Word Simulator Deluxe Game 2023
description: Animal Super Craft is a 2.5D platform game where you take the role of a woodcutter in the forest, where you fight various animals in three different locations.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Original Pack 7
description: A DLC pack for Groove Coaster Wai Wai Party!!!! that includes 10 songs, navigators, and avatars!

name: MX vs. ATV: Legends - Icon Pack
description:
The biggest edition in the MX vs ATV franchise history, only available for a limited time!

Icon Pack Details:
- 22 extra tracks scheduled for release in 2022
- 36 OEM vehicles from Honda, Husqvarna, Kawasaki, KTM, Polaris, Suzuki and Yamaha
- Exclusive customization pack for your rider and rides

name: Death Scourges
description: Death Scourges is a linear and dark third person shooter mixed with tactical elements. You embody the captain of a special strike team consisting of four elite operators. Shoot, loot, craft and use your team to survive the unknown horror lurking in the depths of an underground research facility.

name: Grid Legends: Winter Bash
description: It's the season to party! Pick your favorite car and jump in.

name: Amabilly
description: Amabilly is a lovely girl who loves rock 'n' roll, and this story is about her greatest adventure! With her favorite guitar as a weapon, she faces strange creatures and even the greatest of the challenges! It's time to Rock!

name: Stunts Above Clouds
description: Are you bored of doing the same trivial things?

name: Rocket Jumper
description: The only thing that can move in a limited movement environment is the recoil of the gun.

name: Under the Map
description: A Horror Survival Game where you enter a backroom-style area trying to fight off entities and escape the many many levels. Will you dare to play?

name: Stonga Bird
description: Stonga Bird is a score attack game about pushing your bird to its limits. A difficult game about avoiding pipes using a floaty-feeling irradiated bird.

name: Espada de Sheris
description: The original indie videogame 2D platformer focused on parkour beta created in 2020 that tells the story of the future of 4000 the cat Kibo Butterboard Ansakamon viewing crystals power was stolen by Sovereign Stickers alien demon

name: RICE: Repetitive Indie Combat Experience
description: A rich paragraph of information which will try to charm and pique interest, trying to catch your eye in a sea of competition using a slew of buzzwords such as ‘bullet heaven’ and ‘in-depth meta-progression’, in a vain attempt to make you believe this game is any different from others in it’s genre.

name: Switch the Track
description: Switch the Track is a short puzzle game where you are in charge of a train track control panel. Your objective is to interact with the switches and signals in order to take the trains to their correct destination.

name: Minecraft: Master Chief Mash-up
description: Welcome to the Minecraft Master Chief Mash-up, which includes more than 50 skins, a bespoke texture set with themed UI, an original soundtrack, and an amazing world filled with iconic locations to explore.

name: TekTopia
description: TekTopia frees the poor villagers’ hands and finally lets them do their jobs! Build a village in your own unique style and watch as interested visitors arrive - recruit nomads and trade with the merchant to build up a thriving town. Watch as the farmers till the ground, lumberjacks chop down trees, and the children chase each other in a merry game of tag, all the while being kept safe by the ever vigilant guards. There are over 20 different villager professions to choose from and over 18 unique structures to make your village work for you.

name: Ore Excavation
description: Allows players to mine whole veins of ore, cut down whole trees or any other tool based action in one go. Simple, easy to understand, configs are also provided for mod pack developers such as tool or block black listings, size limits, tick rate and much more.

name: FoamFix
description: FoamFix is a mod designed to optimize certain aspects of a modded Minecraft experience using simple, targeted optimizations.

name: Driftwood
description: A game about downhill longboarding and a sloth named Eddy. Ride as fast as you can and watch out that you don't fly out of a curve!

name: Sector 598
description: Play as the Hacker, trapped in the virtual dome known as Sector 598 being lead and controlled by the ADMIN for the past 28 years. Things change once the Hacker finds out there is something sinister going on, can you fight your way out and escape in this turn based strategy game?

name: Shape Shipter
description: In this arcade shmup roguelike, you control a shapeshifting spaceship. Adapt to a different playstyle in each encounter - shoot, dodge & destroy wave after wave of the toughest foes.

name: Stick Bros
description: Customize your own stickman with cool items you can buy in ingame-marketplace or Trade items and become rich There's more come and see!

name: The Duelist: Sanaculus
description: At all times, when the whole world is falling apart, the only ones you can rely on are old brothers in arms. It's time to gather them again for the decisive battle. It is a story of a medieval condottiere - a soldier of fortune, a squad leader, and a skilled duelist.

name: Super Raft Boat Together
description: The world's been flooded. All you have left is your Super Raft Boat… and your friends! Work together to expand your raft while fending off the strangely violent (and wealthy??) creatures of the sea in this multiplayer roguelike shooter. Will your crew survive and reach the Final Island?

name: Haunting of the Evil Spirit
description: Horror Visual Novel Set in a haunted house, with multiple puzzles, paths and endings. Reads like a book. Approximately 3 hours of content.

name: Gravity Castle
description: Gravity Castle is a puzzle-action platformer game. You become a pilgrim and embark on a journey that will never return, deep into the depths of Gravity Castle. You'll have to face the malevolence of the dungeon, with a mystical tool that allows you to handle the gravity.

name: Ecchi Beauties 2
description: Ecchi Beauties is the perfect Waifu puzzle game. Enjoy our beauftiful girls in 24 images in the gallery after you unlocked them in the game. The Gallery itself is easy controllable.

name: Electro Magnate
description: Energy business clicker: buy power generators, batteries and equip a sales office.

name: HBM's Nuclear Tech Mod
description: The Nuclear Tech Mod basically uses the concept of a technical mod and combines it with explosives and radiation! You can craft different bombs, mine new ores and use new machines to create advanced materials! The main bombs all use a GUI controlled explosion system, which requires you to fill the bombshells with explosive materials, trigger mechanisms and even radioactive parts! All explosives are survival ready, everything is craftable!

name: Idle Drift Kings
description: Idle Drift Kings is a top-down idle game with physics based drifting mechanics. Start your drifting career and earn reputation to buy upgrades and travel to new drift spots. Climb the ranks to become the next Idle Drift King!

name: Phanotia I: Escavive
description: "Phanotia I: Escavive" is an ARPG game using pixel style. Players will play the role of "Connecticut" to find rescue in the wilderness and make the Mobile Fortress "Oslou" out of danger.

name: Meteor Commander
description: Retro-inspired arcade-style shooter. Save humanity from incoming waves of flaming hot meteors, alien ships hell-bent on destroying humanity, and the strangeness of space by shooting, blasting and nuking incoming waves of meteors and enemies.

name: Hitman 3: Street Art Pack
description: Express your style with the Street Art Pack.

name: Hitman 3: Makeshift Pack
description: Express your style with the Makeshift Pack.

name: Hitman 3: Seven Deadly Sins Collection
description: Hitman 3: Seven Deadly Sins takes you deep into the mind of Agent 47. Get exclusive sin-themed suits and take on brand new challenges to unlock unique rewards. Can you resist all seven sins? This pack includes access to all seven content packs, as they become available.

name: Mouse Tweaks
description: Mouse Tweaks replaces the standard RMB dragging mechanic, adds two new LMB dragging mechanics and an ability to quickly move items with the scroll wheel.

name: Sniper Somali Strike
description: Capt. Tom Deom, 43, has been taken hostage by pirates who tried to hijack the U.S.-flagged Marsk Alabama. The Ventura county native is being held on a speed-boat that is heading towards Somalia's anarchic, gun-plagued shores.

name: Dungeon Time
description:
A sorcerer known as the Prophet has spilled Chaos into the world. Four weathered adventurers must track him down and find out if it was just a misunderstanding or if the world is really going to end.
Dungeon Time features arcade quality gaming with a sprinkle of smooth mobile controls. Crawl with up to 4 players Co-Op or go just go it alone. Homage to RPG & shmup classics - a top-down shooter with zombies, wizards, demons, and exploding owls.

name: Pickle Pete
description:
A mysterious substance has turned Pete into a pickle!
Darkness has settled over the world, and our hero must find a way to survive against the waves of evil forces. Stack up, gear up, and create countless combinations of unique builds to become stronger than your enemies. Find the antidote and save the world!

name: Chuzzle 2
description:
Fall back in love with a fuzzy, non-stop explosion of adorable Chuzzle matching action!
Slide and match colorful chuzzles, and watch them sneeze, shiver and explode with delight! But watch out for locks and other dangers as you take on dozens of Chuzzle challenges in your quest to funkify the universe!
Your pet Chuzzles are waiting for you to find them! Unlock them all to fill your very own Chuzzarium! Take a break to watch your Chuzzles swing, run, dance, eat, and play! Raptisoft's ADO (artificial digital organism) technology makes your pet Chuzzles feel real!
So cuddle up with Puzzle fun -- once you start popping Chuzzles, you won't be able to stop!

name: Sudoku For 2
description: Introducing "Sudoku For 2"! Now you can play sudoku with friends, with family, or join random match games. Explore the whole new way of enjoying sudoku puzzle!

name: Notakto
description:
Simple to learn and hard to master, Notakto is a variation on Tic-Tac-Toe where BOTH players make X's and whoever makes three-in-a-row loses.
Difficulty ranges from Easy to Insane. At Insane, the computer uses advanced game theory techniques to play a perfect game, so don't make any mistakes if you want to win!
Unlock all levels and play on up to six boards at the same time!
Choose Rated Play and work toward becoming Notakto World Champion.

name: Trupuzzle
description:
Trupuzzle is a game for those who like racking their brains over passing seemingly a simple level. And then, having passed, you feel completely satisfied.
On the playing field of TRUpuzzlE there are groups of green pieces of several colors. The player’s task comes to moving the green group of pieces into a specified location. In fact, it’s not easy, you will have to make up multi-steps combinations trying to remove unnecessary pieces from you path.
Visually the game looks really attractive – it is developed in steam-punk style. TRUpuzzlE provides several dozens of levels and the application is universal.

name: Gem Collapse
description: Fast paced block busting fun in this action packed game! Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the blocks overpower you. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Glow
description:
Glow is an extremely addictive puzzle game, and by far the best game of its kind in AppStore yet!
The Rule is simple: Light-up the shape with a continuous line without retracing paths!
The addictiveness of this game has been proven with several similar Chart-Topping Apps! But have you been frustrated with their improvement-needed controls, and the limited puzzle counts?

name: Black Eye Spin
description:
Black Eye Spin continues series of puzzle-multiplayer games.
Playing this game you have to spin the wheel and catch colored balls. 3 or more adjacent one color balls explode and create X balls. X balls create higher value X balls. Highest is black ball. We call it Black Eye. Wheel has only 16 slots. So it will be good exercise for your brain trying not to fill all the slots otherwise the game will end.
All created X balls will be collected and can be used in multiplayer game Black Eye World – another same series game.

name: Aqua Jewel
description:
This is a puzzle game where you link three jewels to make them disappear within the time limit.
AquaJewel provides two modes for you; the Classic Mode where you can
level up gradually or the Quest Mode where you have to change all the
panel background to complete a level!

name: Shuzle
description: Minimalistic mind-bending shuffle puzzle.

name: Recon in Force
description: ReconInForce is a turn based strategy game using deception, ambush, and tactics. Dominate the field with an armada of troops and unlimited strategic options. Sneak through cities and forests or deploy smoke to hide until it is time to strike. Spy on the enemy with scouts to prevent surprises. Leverage the strengths of your commanders and soldiers to attack and destroy the enemy’s base!

name: Totem Clash
description:
Totem Clash is a 2-player strategy game that excels on design.
The objective of the game is to push your opponent out of the board while trying to stay alive. To do so, you will have to protect capture points, collect items and find the best positioning.

name: The Lost Crown
description:
Return the crown to king's castle.
Challenge yourself with 3 stars.
Piece can only move on path with same color.

name: Laps Fuse: Puzzle with Numbers
description: Fuse your tiles together and play for hours with addicting puzzle mechanics in Laps!

name: Oh! Sheep
description:
Command a group of wooly friends to save the world from the evil Dr.Friedrich in this fun and challenging path-drawing puzzle game!
Lead a herd of sheep by drawing paths to command them and get past obstacles.
Steal magic berries from the mad scientist to save the world. Use the berries to change color and trigger switches to help the sheep escape!

name: Zane
description:
What is Zane ?
Zane is harmony.
Absolute new logic game with unique game play and visual logic.
Everyone of 50 level has multiple beautiful solutions.
Find the balance of your inner Zane and reach harmony.

name: Soccer Showdown 3
description: Soccer Showdown's genre-revolutionizing PhysKick engine gives you perfect control over every kick. This isn't your average "flick-the-ball" soccer game. Soccer Showdown is entirely physics based; your finger IS your foot.

name: Soccer Wind Shot
description: You must kick the ball in the goal in this simple and addictive windy soccer game!

name: Star Connect
description:
Something wakes Lucy up in the middle of the night. It's the stars! And they need help!
Join her in this trip connecting the stars and making them glow. All around the sky there are constellations to join but you will soon encounter difficulties such as satellites and black holes.

name: Very Iconic Pixels - 80s Quiz
description:
Put your 80s knowledge to the test with the VIP 80s retro pixel quiz!
We’re taking you time-travelling in the DeLorean back to the world of 80s music, movies, TV and sport, where you’ll identify iconic pixel-art characters to score stars and progress along the Hollywood Walk of Fame.

name: Underworld Football Manager
description:
Underworld Football Manager 2019-2020 mixes traditional soccer club tactics and strategy with bribery and sabotage in a unique twist on soccer management.
Build a soccer empire and pit your top eleven players against millions of managers across the globe. Part football manager, part city builder, part strategy, you’ll need to sign young pro players and turn them into superstars, while building up your city and facilities to gain every inch of advantage you can.
But simply setting up your squad isn’t enough! You’ll need to use all your cunning to bribe and attack your opponents’ players, and vandalize their facilities to gain an edge over the competition!

name: Under the Sea: Swim
description:
This gams is big fun with tough , speed, exciting!
you have to escape from big fish!

name: Word Search & Learn
description: It's time to WORD SEARCH & LEARN: The new FREE game from Mobnyx!!! A whole new experience in Word Search games: you will challenge your brain and learn at the same time!

name: Woodroid HD+
description: Woodroid mix the brick breaker gameplay, pixelart graphics and awesome visual effects to enjoy breaking all the pixels for free during more than 100 levels.

name: White Tiles Master
description: An addicting game that tests your reflexes against time and movement. Test your speed and accuracy with this simple and fun game!

name: TouchSports Tennis 2012 HD
description: Tired of Tennis games with difficult controls that just don't work? Tennis 2012's Natural Motion controls allow players to effortlessly move on the court and play like a pro. Dragging one finger on the screen moves the tennis player. Swiping with 2 fingers swings the racket with ultimate precision and controls. Its that easy! Place a drop shot just over the net, out of your opponents reach, lob the ball over your opponent to back court, or smash a top spin cross court. A control system designed for pro players and beginners alike!

name: Explo Bee
description:
Help the dizzy spinning bee fly from flower to flower pollinating as he goes!
Simply tap the screen to launch the bee and he will fly in a straight line (hopefully) landing on another flower. Go for Speed combos or play it safe, but make sure your aim is true or you will lose the bee.
Don't wait too much on a flower or you'll explode!!!
BuzzBee features an easy, pick up and play, one-touch control scheme. Suitable for any age, the game offers cute, colorful graphics and full-length musical scores.
There are ten rounds of gameplay which progressively increase in difficulty, local high score rankings and even a voice-over by a professional opera singer.

name: Icontrivia: Guess the Character
description:
Test your knowledge about these popular characters from cartoons, fairytales, movies and others, in this highly addictive word guessing game.
Hints & Help: Struggling to guess a character? You can reveal or remove letters to help you figure out the character.

name: High Dive
description:
Walter likes diving. Birds like flying. Hmmmmmmm.
Help Walter break the world outdoor diving record in this pseudo–endless arcade diver!

name: Hidden Garden Word Scramble
description: Enter the garden with a whole new objective! Hidden Garden Word Scramble is the first in a series of word based puzzle games in the Hidden Garden Series. Try to make as many words as you can with the letters given to you before time runs out!

name: GT Ride
description:
The Kia pro_cee'd GT presents GT RIDE. The racing app like no other.
Create tracks by moving your mobile device through the air. Race them and challenge your friends!
To create unique tracks of your own download the GT RIDE app to your smartphone or tablet. Start creating tracks by simply moving your mobile device around through the air. The in-built sensors will track your movements and turn them into 3D tracks with curves and loops that you'll never have experienced before!
Find out who's more skilled at racing – you or your friends?
Share your tracks and challenge them. Race theirs to break their record and get ahead of them in the highscore.

name: Jetrats Defense
description:
Jetrats Defense is an addictive defense game! It reached Top10 games in several countries.
Build some towers then wait your enemies pass through? No No No! Let's take up weapons and shoot them!
Don't deceiving by the first several simple levels, the following battles is really tough, that's why the simple levels are there!

name: Meatly's Storage World
description: Oh, the horror! Another "terrifying" first person mascot horror game where you do stuff and not get caught. Over several minutes of gameplay! Lore! Discover the secrets, I guess.

name: Magnificent Alfie
description: Magnificent Alfie is an endless runner where you want to advance as far as possible without failing. Along the run you can collect stars which is the game's currency and will enable you to purchase upgrades to help you survive for longer.

name: Math Genius King of Arithmetic
description: The best math gameplay! Have fun with Math Genius and prove that you are a prodigy of mathematics. Additions, subtractions or both, divisions and multiplications. With this app you can improve your mathematical calculation skills. Train and compete with friends. As a mathematics quiz you will have to indicate the result of each operation before it reaches the ground.

name: Mini Golf Halloween
description: Featuring 30 scary and challenging holes, fantastic graphics, accurate physics and a spooky atmosphere.

name: Mini Racing: Mini Cars Curling
description:
Do you remember mini cars you played with your friends when you were child?
Very small, but very fast our mini car race.
The mini cars came back as game!

name: SkyDive Racer
description:
Race through the sky as you glide and parachute from plane to ship. Pick up coins throughout different routes while avoiding drones, birds and other obstacles. Collect mystery boxes along the way to gain special abilities. Upgrade your player to improve your chance to be the best skydive racer.
Can you finish first? No matter what happens, dance with your friends at the end of each landing. Have fun!

name: Shopping Mall Parking
description: Sin descripción

name: ReCharge RC
description: Drift your way into ReCharge RC! Featuring limitless vehicle customization, online track sharing with an ever growing catalog, global online leaderboards for every track, even the ones you create, and asynchronous multiplayer allowing you to race the ghost of every leaderboard entry! Enjoy realistic physics that blur the lines between arcade and simulation and allow rookies and veterans alike to experience the joy that is RC racing!

name: Quarter Monkey
description: Quarter Monkey or "Rob3 Erd", The well-known Egyptian traditional game revamped to suit all of us.

name: Pen Fight
description: Knock your opponent’s pens off the table by flicking your pen against theirs! Pen Fight is a fantastic new game that combines simple controls, great physics, and an element of strategy.

name: Paradise Story
description:
The schedule of an angel in paradise may not be quite what you expect…
You may think it is quiet… that there is nothing to do…
Think again ! There is no shortage of work to do in paradise ! To realise this, you will live a busy day beyond the clouds… Oh my God !

name: Nitro Nation: Drag Racing
description: Race, mod, and tune dozens of real licensed cars. Start a team, invite your friends, win tournaments. Trade car parts with other racers in real time and build your dream car for both Drag and Drift races!

name: Ninja Chicken 2
description: Ninja Chicken 2 is a very enjoyable, addictive game with a highly amusing and original premise and its great for short bursts or to play for ages.

name: Monster Bang
description: Monster Bang is a classical Match 3 Game. Super fun! Easy to play. You just need to move the monsters to make 3 or more monsters of the same kind in one line and they will be crushed. Play more and more surprise!

name: 4 Snaps
description: Play the sharing picture game everyone has been talking about! 4 Snaps is the most popular social picture snapping and guessing game! Experience for yourself the laugh-out-loud game your friends are raving about!

name: Brain Battle
description:
Good old pen & paper game known from schooldays is now on mobile! That’s Brain Battle - Trivia and Word game.
Grab your knowledge of cars, animals, actors and actresses and many more categories and challenge up to three friends or random players to the showdown of brain power.

name: Cargo Bridge
description:
The most popular game Cargo Bridge from Limex Games becomes available to millions of our fans on the iPad in 2011. In Cargo Bridge your goal is to build bridges within each one of 24 levels, that allows your little workers to move heavy cargo (which include crates, safes, and even elephants) from one side of a valley to the other.
With every level, the difficulty increases. You have to build bridges across larger gaps, up and down inclines, and around obstacles in your path. You are also given access to new building materials. If you want to have a break from game levels, just enter the Challenge mode. Use money collected in game levels to build the longest bridge you can.

name: Buoy Boy
description:
The endless floater adventure of Buoy Boy is here!
Help him become a real boy again and collect all the treasure in the ocean.

name: Eevoo II
description: Play eevoo and discover a new world! Professor McEvo has opened a portal to a parallel dimension directly atop our own. Your task is to enter the fantastical world of eevoo to aid him in his research. Settle a new and uncharted land, claim real world locations in a virtual world, build your own empire, challenge your friends, and experience the stunning Augmented Reality gameplay of this brave new world.

name: Eggies
description:
Hatch the all Eggies!
Eggies want to be part of our planet but their eggs need great sense for solicitude and care. Are you good enough to feed, cure and hatch them all? Your reward will be love and fun gained from your virtual pets.
Eggies are ready to play with you various games like Flappy Egg, Pexeso, Puzzle. Visit shop where you can decorate your Eggie or change its appearance. Do you have favorite color? Or would you like to try some ornament or original hat? Everything is possible!

name: Search
description: Play as a Park Ranger in Dreary Lake Provincial Park and unravel the mysteries your coworkers are trying to keep hidden.

name: Alien Slayers
description: Alien Slayers is a roguelite time survival game where you hunt down hostile alien creatures on various planets. Grab your weapon and survive to the end to become the strongest alien.

name: Slendrina X
description:
This is Slendrina X! The 10th slendrina game in this series!
This time you are a prisoner in a big castle that belongs to Slendrinas husband.
You have to escape to complete the game by finding the entrance key.
Slendrina is watching you as always and her husband is walking around the dark corridors, and he is mad.
Watch out for him and his 2 pets that bites hard.

name: Slendrina
description: Slendrina is a horror game where you have to find items to get you out of different places, but someone is following you all the time. And if you look at her for too long ..... well, then she will get you .....

name: De Blob
description: The cancelled DS port of de Blob.

name: Stick War 3
description: Stick War 3 is an epic online military strategy and action game where you try to destroy the statue in the enemy base while preventing your enemies from destroying your own, all with an army of stickmen you control while also deciding which units to invest your resources in.

name: Chinese New Year 2013
description: Chinese New Year 2013 is a Google Doodle made to celebrate the year of the Snake.

name: 100th Anniversary of the Crossword Puzzle
description: An interactive crossword game by Google.

name: Wizard Hentai Survivors
description: Roguelite Hentai combat with Wizards! Explore the world, find beautiful women, grow stronger with each encounter! Over 100+ beautiful anime girls need to be saved in this bullet hell!

name: Chinese Expeditionary Force: Assault Team
description: Chinese Expeditionary Force - Assault Team is a tactical stealth game set in the expedition of the Chinese Expeditionary Force to Burma during World War II. The assault team consists of five characters, each with their own special skills. You can use different strategies to complete the mission.

name: Third
description: An experimental serious meta game.

name: Touhou Danmaku: Infinity
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: The NewZealand Story
description:
"The NewZealand Story" is an action game released by Taito in 1988.
Take control of the hero TIKI on an adventure to rescue your darling Phee-phee from the leopard seal.
Each stage is a sprawling maze. Fight your way to the goal, using balloons for floating action gameplay!

name: Wonder Boy: Anniversary Collection
description: One SEGA icon. Six perfect games. 21 different versions!

name: Extreme Highway Racing: Real Speed Driver
description: Maximum drive at maximum speed on extreme tracks!

name: Unblock the Brick: Casual Block Puzzle
description: A classic puzzle game in which you have to move blocks and make way for the main block!

name: Horror Tale
description: Start a scary adventure and be the first to solve all the mysteries of this horror game!

name: Souls of Chronos
description: Classic JRPG + Action Combat System

name: The Intership
description: A teenage-themed narrative game where you can choose between 4 different characters. Try to prevent some students from disturbing and creating chaos.

name: OshiIro
description: Swing your glowstick and exorcise! A new kind of horror game!

name: Shark Attack: Fish Predator Ocean Sea Adventure Survival
description: Who is the king of the underwater world? What animal is as old as the world? Many people don't even know what it looks like - of course it's a Shark! With our game Shark Attack: Fish Predator you can feel like a shark.

name: Anime Girls: Camping Trip
description: The day of camping with friends has arrived, prove to be the memory of the group! It's up to you to prove that you know all the rules of camping. Answer the questions quickly.

name: Nature Escapes: Collector's Edition
description: Get ready to get lost in the wild beauty of Nature with this hidden object game!

name: DobbyxEscape: Spooky Adventure
description: A fun Halloween inspired Room Escape game!

name: Match Ventures
description: Curse is set upon Cliffmon Castle. Show your magic skills and fight the darkness.

name: Tales of Shinobi
description: Tales of Shinobi is a single-player adventure game where you get to play as a powerful Shinobi who must save the world from evil!

name: Fear in Hospital: Escape Horror Story
description: Spine-chilling horror in an abandoned mental hospital - collect notes and keys, solve puzzles and find your way to the exit!

name: ExitMan Deluxe
description: Quickly run into the gap as the ceiling comes crashing down from above. If you make it in time the ceiling will rise up again and then crash down again and again, each time with the gap in a random place. How long can you survive?

name: Maze / Break
description: Gather your team, arm them with some gear and try to find the way out through the hordes of monsters in a procedurally generated maze!

name: SoundStorm
description: A Shoot 'em Up with music driven gameplay. Bullets flash to the rhythm of the music. Hit the bullets exactly on the beat to destroy them and make chain reactions. Feel the music and enjoy the unique game experience combining patterns and rhythms.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Calatori B 26-26 064
description: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2019: CFR Calatori B 26-26 186
description: Manufactured at the "VEB Waggonbau Goerlitz" factory in Germany, this versatile doubledecker car was used on regional passenger transport by the Romanian operator CFR and then by CFR Calatori, being repainted into various paintschemes through the years, mainly different types of blue paint.

name: Trainz Plus: QUBE GE C44aci Pack
description: The C44aci is a model of Australian heavy duty diesel electric locomotive designed by UGL Rail and built at the Broadmeadow factory. It is operated by a number of rail freight operators. The design is based on the National Rail NR class but with some modifications and upgraded features.

name: Ivoverse
description:
Ivoverso is a PvP battle game connected to Twitch chat via commands, and also a collection of NFT cards.
Users compete by logging in with chat commands to be the last to survive in 1v1 matches with randomly assigned cards from the Ivoverse! If they also have NFTs from the collection, they will receive a life bonus in each battle!

name: Zombocity
description: Imagine a beautiful day when you went out for a walk with your rollers and .... Zombiessssss! Everywhere!

name: Equal People
description: Welcome to the City of Neapolis. You are here to solve a Mystery. Talk to People and Get Clues.

name: Salary Man Kintarou: The Game
description: Salary Man Kintarou: The Game is a Playstation game based on comics of the same name. It consists of many mini-games.

name: Omega Survivors
description: Omega Survivor is a sci-fi bullet hell, part of the new "Survivor" genre with loot, crafting and lots of alien blasting to be done. The perfect game for those that just want to relax and turn off their brain.

name: Madshot: Road to Madness
description:
Road to Madness is a stand-alone spin-off of Madshot, which introduce a new vertical-style survivor gameplay!
Slaughter endless abominations while moving stylishly through a lovecraftian nightmare. Combine a multitude of unlockable weapons, abilities and upgrades in order to survive as long as possible, and reach the top of the leaderboards.

name: Outlaw Heart
description:
Outlaw Heart is a Fast Paced Character Action/Rail Shooter that is playable on Flatscreen or VR!

Help Remy and her band shred their way through the city they love!

name: Project Red
description: Fight in the Blood Arena for your life. Earn, bet money and prove to your team your skills in a fair fight. (3v3, 2v2, 1v1) Blood Arena, poker and many more activities on Project Red will allow you to earn $EGLD while showing your skills to the whole mafia.

name: Minecraft: N7 Mash-up
description: Shape the fate of your Minecraft galaxy with this amazing mash-up, which includes thirty-six character skins, bespoke game textures, themed menus, a dedicated world filled with iconic locations, and an original soundtrack compilation to set the mood.

name: Pokémon Regulation Red
description: Pokemon Regulation is a rom hack that attempts to maintain as much of the vanilla experience as possible while also allowing players to challenge themselves by applying special rules to the gameplay. Upon starting a New Game, you will be asked to provide a regulation code before your adventure starts. You can generate regulation codes on https://pokereg.net/

name: Pokémon Regulation Blue
description: Pokémon Regulation is a rom hack that attempts to maintain as much of the vanilla experience as possible while also allowing players to challenge themselves by applying special rules to the gameplay. Upon starting a New Game, you will be asked to provide a regulation code before your adventure starts. You can generate regulation codes on https://pokereg.net/

name: Astrobit
description: A free PvP space shooter with epic RPG mechanics. Upgrade your ship and explore new builds every match by combining different weapons, skills and abilities. Be a swift assassin, a tanky heavy-hitter, or go deep into magic to destroy your opponent and climb the ranks. The choice is yours!

name: Terra Incognita
description: Terra Incognita a 3D action RPG in the tradition of Zelda, with basic hack-and-slash combat, platforming and simple box-based puzzles. It was created for Net Yaroze by Mitsuru Kamiyama, years before he was hired by Square Enix and create the Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles series.

name: Papyrus's Big Christmas Adventure
description: It's Christmas in the Underground, Sans and Papyrus are preparing Christmas Eve dinner, until Papyrus realizes that he forgot to hide Sans' gift. Papyrus runs out to hide him and Sans tell him that if he's not home in 10 minutes, Sans would have dinner without him.

name: The Return to Freddy's 2: Winter Wonderland
description: The Return to Freddy's 2: Winter Wonderland is a reboot of the 2015 fangame. From 12 AM to 6 AM, survive your shift at the soon-to-open pizzeria while dealing with the increasingly erratic behavior of its mascots. Following each night, you will be required to complete a maintenance task to wrap up.

name: Yadon Paradise Fishing
description: A Slowpoke must catch some fishes with his tail in this official, free Pokémon browser game.

name: Pokémon Perfect Crystal
description: Pokémon Perfect Crystal is an idealized definitive version of Pokemon Crystal that has every Pokemon available to catch and to fixes a number of glaring glitches that hampered the original game. It also restores the Celebi and GS Ball events, makes trade evolutions avalaible through evolution stones, makes TMs reusable, and changes opponents' levels to match Heartgold & SoulSilver.

name: Digimon: Digital Heroes
description: A Digimon platformer fan-game. You can play as every (partner) digimon from the original Adventure & Adventure 02! Each character is able to perform a physical attack and a ranged skill. Most of them also have abilities like flight or swimming.

name: Heaven for Death
description:
A fangame from "Bocchi the Rock!" series made in RPG Maker.
Ryou is dead and amnesiac and Nijika is her angel. Together they're in heaven.

name: The Soul's Choice
description: Play against the clock in single-player mode or play together with up to 10 people in multiplayer mode. If the evil spirit chooses you, you will have to kill everyone. If he doesn't choose you, your mission is to help destroy the soul by collecting voodoo dolls. Don't forget to strategize to win.

name: Ohka Bots
description:
Ohka Bots is a free-to-play action role-playing multiplayer online game available for PC.

A battle to save Cyberspace and become the strongest BOT you can be. Upgrade and customize your BOT as you power up and loot your way through the Virus threat that has infested Cyberspace.

name: NeonNoir
description: NeonNoir is a hybrid point-and-click adventure/visual novel game for the Amiga 1200.

name: Lifeline: Whiteout 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Fat Prisoner Simulator
description: Fat Prisoner Simulator - a soccer simulator where you play the role of a prisoner. The jail managers have noticed that some prisoners, who really like to eat a lot, can hardly go through the doors, including those of their cells.

name: Kingdom Two Crowns: Shogun
description: The next iteration in the successful microstrategy franchise, Kingdom Two Crowns will allow players to venture to exotic biomes across the world through expandable content. On day 1 of release, players can journey to lands inspired by the landscape, architecture, and culture of feudal Japan. Play as the mighty Shogun or Onna-bugeisha, enlist the support of the ninja, lead your soldiers to battle atop the mythological Kirin, and form new strategies as you brave the Greed hiding in the thick bamboo forests.

name: Cats War
description: Cats War is an incredibly addictive third-person shooter. You have to play as a cat who wants to take revenge on the ducks for their bad deeds! You have deadly fists, a bat and even a pistol in your arsenal! Punish all ducks and collect all flowers.

name: Astral Sorcery
description: Astral Sorcery is a magic mod focused around harnessing the powers of starlight and the constellations. Explore and discover the world and the sky above you; focus starlight to your will, strengthening yourself or enhancing the world around you.

name: Comfy Cozy
description:
Comfy Cozy is a mod that adds multiple new decorational blocks with the goal of making your Minecraft sessions more "cozy."

That of course, is a subjective term so your results may vary, but my hope is that everyone can find something they like here.

name: Fatal Fantasy VII
description: Experimental indie video game developed by Team Fatal before Terra Incognita for Net Yarooze. It was a reinterpretation of some Final Fantasy VII themes and characters, created by Mitsuru Kamiyama, who after a few years was hired in Square Enix and directed the Final Fantasy Crystal Chronicles series.

name: Legends Mod
description: Ever wanted to build your own lightsaber while flying around in your Iron Man suit battling Godzilla in Minecraft?! Or traverse across the galaxy as a Jedi hunting down the brutal killers of society? The Legends Mod features packs such as Superheroes Unlimited, Horror, Kaiju/Godzilla, and Star Wars, allowing you to suit up as your favorite heroes and villains or become the Jedi and Sith of old to fight in the battle against good evil.

name: Dragon Ball Z: A Batalha dos Deuses
description: Official game for PC developed by brazilian studios Aiyra and Duckbill for the release on the country of the movie Dragon Ball Z: A Batalha dos Deuses.

name: Chaotic Era
description: Chaotic Era is an intense and brutal strategy game inspired by classic science fiction, following a stranded human crew on an alien planet. Scavenge for resources and fight back against mysterious alien terrors in this frantic real-time strategy nightmare.

name: Kingdom Hearts Re:coded Gummiship Studio
description: Kingdom Hearts Re:coded Gummiship Studio is an arcade style game made for Facebook by Square Enix used as a promotion for Kingdom Hearts Re:coded.

name: Final Fantasy VII: Re-Imagined
description: Final Fantasy VII: Re-Imagined is a project made by fans of the original game as an action game in the vein of 2D Side-scrollers, such as Dragons and Dungeons: Chronicles of Mystara, Streets of Rage and so on. You get to play as Cloud or Tifa in one level based on Midgar.

name: WJMax
description: This is a fan game of streamer "woowakgood."

name: Digimon Chronicles: The Alpha Chosen
description: An action-platformer fan game based on the Digimon anime series, created by SE77E in 2019. Only the first episode was released, before he jumped into another game called Digimon: Digital Heroes.

name: Avalanche
description: Avalanche is a free Final Fantasy VII fan-game created by Rich Whitehouse in late 2007. It features third-person action with RPG-like stat/inventory mechanics.

name: Everybody's Golf 2
description: Dust down your clubs - the game for every keen golfer has just returned to the top of the leaderboard.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Re-Revenge
description: Welcome to the universe of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Re-revenge of the Shredder! The city was attacked by a foot ninja army led by Shredder and Krang. Our brave heroes have come together to challenge them and clear the city of evil mutants and foot ninja. But will it be that easy?

name: Crisis Evil 2
description: Crisis Evil 2 is a sequel to the first Resident Evil themed mod by HarlemHero. It takes place at the same time as the events of the first Crisis Evil and features 2 new playable characters: Leon Kennedy and Claire Redfield.

name: Hope
description: Mistakes are not an impediment, but an opportunity to grow. Play and learn from your mistakes. Come and recharge your hopes.

name: Prison Architect: Xbox 360 Edition
description: Take control of the building and running of a maximum security prison as the critically acclaimed lock-em-up arrives on Xbox 360! Your Design, Their Fate Will you build and manage a prison to create social order where it’s failed in the past, offering rehabilitation and peaceful coexistence amongst inmates? Will your prison disregard human rights, impose intentional harshness and be devoid of any notions of wellbeing and freedom? The choice is yours.

name: Inside Jennifer
description: Sin descripción

name: Three Kingdoms Story: Conussia
description: A tale of sex, power, and intrigue set in the Royal Court of a fantasy kingdom. Become the saviour of Conussia, or its doom. Extreme adult content.

name: Reky + Brawl Chess
description: Feast your eyes on crystal clear visuals of reky. Interact with your environment and find a way to reach the finishing...square. Are you ready to become a chess champion? Choose your hero and challenge other players in the game of kings.

name: UnderDungeon + Clumsy Rush
description: Become the deadliest delivery... cat in the world. Intense fights, multiple weapons and demanding boss fights. Join Kimuto on his hardest first day on the job. Clumsy Rush is a guaranteed dose of a laugh for friends and family.

name: It's Kooky + Brawl Chess
description: Look for quirks in the new hidden object game - It's Kooky! Are you ready to become a chess champion? Choose your hero and challenge other players in the game of kings.

name: Ragdoll Rage: Heroes Arena
description: Looking for a multiplayer party game on Nintendo Switch? Ragdoll Rage: Heroes Arena is what you need: ragdoll physics, deadly fights among traps, and tons of fun! Ragdoll Rage is an incredible shooting duel in the battlegrounds full of traps.

name: Street Racers
description: Play your favorite arcade car racing game which is converted from pixel to low-poly art.

name: Swap Puzzles
description:
Swap tiles to reveal beautiful images.
Relax with easy puzzles or challenge yourself with expert difficulty level.

name: Sport & Fun: Swimming
description: Discover a new world of fun! Dive into Sport & Fun: Swimming and use your Joy-Con controllers to experience the cutest challenge in your life.

name: Car Factory Driver
description: In Car Factory Driver you have to take on every driving job. Deliver parts using Trucks, Vans and Fork Lifts!

name: SnowRunner: 2-Year Anniversary Edition
description:
SnowRunner’s 2-Year Anniversary Edition includes the base game as well as the Year 1 and Year 2 Passes.

Get ready for the ultimate off-road experience!

SnowRunner puts you in the driver’s seat of powerful vehicles as you conquer extreme open environments with the most advanced terrain simulation ever. Drive over 60 vehicles from brands such as Ford, Chevrolet, and Freightliner as you leave your mark on an untamed open world.

name: Pixel Game Maker Series: Cat and Tower
description: Cat and Tower is an action time attack game in which you control Moi, a cat, to reach a goal on a tower. Simple controls are just move, jump and dash.

name: Ultreia: Deluxe Edition
description:
Everything you love about point 'n click games - collecting items and lots of interaction with them, solving challenging and unusual puzzles, talking to NPCs with lots of dialogue and an engaging story.

All this is set in a dark world, emphasized by a specific graphic style and a beautiful original soundtrack by Yann Latour.
Along the base game, you also get access to the Soundtrack DLC.

name: Hi Pizza
description: A light, fairy-tale and fantastical deciphering game, with a cat being the protagonist.

name: Redfall: Bite Back Edition
description: The Bite Back Edition includes the Base Game, Redfall Hero Pass, Throwback Outfit Pack, Laser Beam multi-weapon skin and the Tactical Knife Stake attachment.

name: Xenotilt: Hostile Pinball Action
description: Lightning strikes again!! Xenotilt, the sequel to the cult hit, Demo's Tilt. Get ready for another pinball fantasy. Xenotilt shreds the envelope with face-melting gameplay & graphics.

name: Dead Space: Strange Transmissions Quest Pack
description: Isaac Clarke has landed on the Island with the survival skills needed. Includes 1 Outfit, 2 Back Blings, 1 Pickaxe, 1 Built-In Emote and Quests to earn up to 1,500 V-Bucks.

name: One Block: Puzzle Adventure
description:
Do you like puzzles games or brain teasers? You are in a right place!
 One Block is a logic game which focuses on thinking and solving skills. Each puzzle makes you think few steps ahead and gets more and more challenging as you progress.
Hand crafted levels filled with various innovative mechanics are ready to be solved. The goal is simple: merge blocks of the same color and collect stars simultaneously. By the way, you have to stay in the board frame! The logic puzzle starts simple but further in the game you will encounter new elements. Take advantage of each game element and use their powers to stay on the board in order to complete a level.

name: Blocki!
description:
Blocki! is a unique game you haven't seen before. Guide a bird on the board to collect all the scattered pieces and create the displayed shape. Evaluate your logical thinking ability, reflexes, accuracy and creativity. If you're up for a brand new brain teaser you found the right place.
Test your intuition and explore beautifully hand crafted puzzle levels!

name: Nine Tiles
description:
Welcome to NineTiles: The anagram puzzle game that challenges your vocabulary and the speed of your wits.
Battle against the clock to create as many words as you can in survival mode or take a relaxed approach and test your word knowledge with clues and without time pressure in the main game mode. Compete with friends to see who can get to the top of the leaderboards and be the sharpest tile in the box.

name: GoldenEye 007
description: James Bond returns! Relive the timeless gameplay that defined a gaming generation as you guide 007 through a global adventure. Use stealth and force as you see fit to complete your objectives, enjoying achievements and upgraded features that bring Bond to a new age.

name: Lido: The Puzzle Hero
description:
Lido is a hero of the addicting brain teaser – a block puzzle game that will challenge you and train your brain. Put your puzzle skills to the test – we dare you to reach the highest score! A relaxing and easy-to-learn match 3 puzzle game to keep you playing for hours on end! Drag & drop puzzle pieces on the board, aiming to combine sets of 3 or more of the same color. Merge three to clear the puzzle blocks, leaving space for new pieces. The more you clear at once, the higher your score will be.
How many colorful blocks can you connect?

name: How to Die: A Hope Beneath
description: A box was trapped inside a mysterious chamber. There's no way escape from there, except... death. How to Die is a dark, narrative-driven 3D platformer with lot of challenging puzzles.

name: Side Scape
description: A light-hearted, Side-Scroller/ Top-Down hybrid!

name: Backroom Warfare II
description: Fight for survival in the Backrooms. Play with friends in multiplayer or solo against AI bots. Unearth the terrifying monster scorestreak and get ready for an intense experience!

name: Moonlight Pulse
description: Teamwork matters most in this seamless, fantastical metroidvania within a living, breathing world. Realize each character's true potential to take down an invading force of overwhelmingly powerful parasites.

name: Chimeras: Blinding Love - Collector's Edition
description: When several young men are mysteriously found blind and paralyzed, you're called in to investigate! Can you uncover who, or what, is attacking them and return the Parisian streets to safety?

name: Catacombs: The Beginning
description: Catacombs: The Beginning - is an excellent 3D shooter where you have to survive in the catacombs overfull of various monsters.

name: TVs: The Revival
description: TVs The Revival is a platformer single-player game that balances exciting action with challenging puzzles. When the hero "u" awakens from a coma, he is driven through strange events living in the TVs real world to unravel the mysteries of his past and defeat evil forces plaguing the region.

name: Idlenetics
description: Exciting idle tycoon game that immerses you in a beautiful medieval world. The game features a hex-based map that is divided into different zones, each of which is unlocked as the player progresses through the game.

name: Balance Helicopter
description: Balance the helicopter with its two engines! Navigate through increasingly harder levels and different challenges!

name: IOUA
description: An endless torture game set in the distorted remnants of forgotten RPGMaker puzzles.

name: Hiden Ruin
description: A challenging platform game that will test your skill and patience.

name: Don't Get Lost
description: A procedurally-generated, open-world, first-person colony sim. Build colonies in an infinite world, alone or with friends via Steam or self-hosted multiplayer.

name: Fall and Destroy
description: Perhaps the craziest simulator of falls and destruction that you have seen! A variety of attractions, "beaters" and physics settings on the levels will definitely not let you get bored.

name: Flower Memories
description: Exercise your memory alone or with a friend in a beautiful and relaxing environment.

name: Project Nosferatu
description: A fast-paced Action RPG with a fully customizable arsenal combo battle system. Varied landscapes of an interconnected world bring unique dangers in each area, which tie together a complex story about the mystery of the nocturnal, subterranean species known as "Umbrakhs."

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 13 - Collector's Edition
description: Help run Pinecreek Hills and New England's Minuteman Valley!

name: Ultimate Flight Simulator Pro
description: If you want to feel like a real pilot, this airplane game is for you.

name: Brwanjeya
description:
Brwanjeya: is a free-to-play mobile match-three puzzle game. Players compete to stay on the game board by swapping black and white pieces on the board to make a match of three points on the same straight line. It’s a challenging game that motivates you to compete with your competitors.
Take on this amazing adventure alone or play with friends to see who can get the top score!

name: Dice Dreams
description:
Welcome to Dice Dreams!
Roll the dice on Dice dreams, build your magical kingdom and become the Dice King!
Start your board game adventure and join your friends in this dice quest.
With every roll of the dice, you can earn free coins and expand your kingdom. Every dice roll starts a new dice adventure filled with fun and excitement!

name: Blocks Hurt!
description:
Play with blocks in a way you never imagined!
Freaky creatures are coming for you… Stop them! Unchain your deadly blocks, match them, stack them or hurl them against this parade of bizarre monsters!
Are you ready for the most unconventional matching block experience!?

name: Elves Castle and Secrets
description: Elves Castle and Secrets - 3D a game in which you, being an ordinary citizen, decide to explore your small town and find something interesting in it.

name: Bloody Lonely Cold
description: Bloody Lonely Cold is a survival horror game from a first-person perspective. In a future large Japanese hospital. There is a brave beautiful girl who bravely faced monsters in order to survive. When you are with her, don't panic, don't be afraid.

name: Pusu: Uyanış
description: Pusu:Uyanış is the first 3D action game of its kind in Turkey.

name: Aoki Tsubasa no Chevalier
description: Sin descripción

name: Mercenaries Lament: Requiem of the Silver Wolf
description: Mercenaries Lament is a tactical simulation RPG set in a fantasy world.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Super Dino: Extended Edition

name: Jelly Cube Blast
description:
Dive into a new thrilling puzzle challenge!
Help Flan and Soufflé in their exciting adventure to save their grandma, Baba Praline. They will need all of your brains and BLASTS to destroy every Jelly Cube in each level! Solve the colorful puzzle levels to help them during their journey!

name: Sky Burger
description: Catch the falling ingredients to build delicious burgers and earn money. Stack your burger into the sky: the better your burger, the bigger your tip! Unlock new burger recipes, new ingredients and new items to dress up your character and customize your food truck. What are you waiting for? Start building your burger now!

name: LightEaters!
description:
The LightEaters are coming… because darkness is never safe! Explore the perils and pitfalls of the night with the help of your trusty flashlight in this whimsically spooky platform adventure game.

The mysterious LightEaters aren’t the only dangers lurking in the murk! You’ll need wits, speed, and the power of your imagination to navigate through the dark, defeat traps and puzzles, and evade the enemies in your way!

name: With My Cat
description:
Spend more time with your kittens and get to know them.
Various kinds and personalities. Let's start a new life with unique kittens.

name: NASCAR Manager
description: NASCAR Manager is the all new official NASCAR game that puts you in control! Take the Crew Chief seat in the most popular motorsport in North America. Decide your strategy, run the best tactics and make the calls that guide your driver to victory! Are you ready for a real challenge?

name: Brazen Fruit
description:
Let's go Brazen Fruit! Make combos by combining colorful fruits!
Start playing Brazen Fruit
This unique game is one of the most interesting mobile games of all time!
Match Fruits in this combo arcade game to progress to the next level.
Get that great feeling when your best combos rewarded with gold keys and other bonuses!
Take on this great game alone or play with friends to see who can finished all levels!
Brazen Fruit is completely free to play.
Get ready for a fun new adventures with Brazen Fruit!

name: Motor World: Car Factory
description: Step into the captivating and cheerful Motor World, filled with amazing cars and shiny, happy people! Run a small car factory and turn it into the best company in the world. Build your cars, create new ones, make your workers happy, please your customers, arrange your retail stores and play with your friends.

Tap screen to sit on the chair when the light bulb turns on.
Sounds simple, but be warned... tap too early, or too late and your soul will be crushed into of pain and damnation for ever and ever, or until you try again.

Besides logic, speed and skill also play an important part in the game!
The basic rule remains the same: direct the liquid to the target place by rotating the pipes in the right direction!

description: Master the World Famous Top Gear Test Track in a brand new Top Gear game. Put yourself behind the wheel of some of the iconic cars from the TV Show to complete our precision driving obstacle courses, play the all-new Total Destruction mode or even chase the legend that is The Stig!

description:
The first rule of Battle Golf is that you do not talk about Battle Golf
The Second rule of Battle Golf is please share Battle Golf on Twitter
Play Golf against the clock or against a friend, head shots are encouraged.

description: Fruit Logic is a super fun, addictive puzzle game for iPhone and iPad. Join the pictures of fruits and other eye candy items and get to the super colour bomb to win the game!

name: Partia
description: Partia is a SRPG (Strategy Role-playing) video game inspired by Fire Emblem and Tear Ring Saga series. In a high fantasy setting, the game will take players through an adventure where magic and sword collide and friendship and betrayal intertwine.

name: Bloodborne Kart
description:
Bloodborne Kart was an unofficial fan game made by the community. Race through the streets of Yharnam and beyond with a wide array of vehicles, ranging from traditional karts to motorcycles to wheelchairs!

Days before its intended release on January 26th, 2024, Sony requested the removal of copyrighted content from the game. The game was delayed and was reworked into Nightmare Kart.

name: Dora Think Nobita's Exciting Brain Adventure
description: Doraemon: Nobita's Exciting Adventure is an adventure puzzle RPG game. In order to rescue Doraemon who was accidentally imprisoned in the mysterious city, you solve graphics, puzzles, mazes and other problems along the way to defeat robot soldiers, and adventure with Nobita, Shizuka, Fat Tiger, and Suneo. The stage of the adventure is the world in the secret prop "Game Book". The interior of the huge castle is divided into 10 floors, and each floor consists of multiple levels. The level screen is in 3D RPG style, and robot soldiers will block Nobita and his friends wherever they go.

name: Poglings
description:
Poglings is a cute, pet simulation, creature collecting adventure. Play as Keeble: a young boy who's taken up the profession of becoming a Pogling Hatcher.

Each day is a new opportunity that will offer fun and unique challenges as you make friends and grow your nest of Poglings. Put in a hard days work and some of the more colorful and rare poglings could be yours! Explore your island, discover its secrets and race against other Poglings! Learn enough and you could become a master hatcher!
