name: Tetsudou Nippon! Real Pro Tokkyu Soko! Nagoya Tetsudou-hen
description:
A train simulation game from Sonic Powered's "Japanese Rail Sim" series.

In this entry, you can drive through over 70km from Meitetsu Gifu Station to Jingumae Station on the Meitetsu Nagoya Main Line, from Jingumae Station to Tokoname Station on the Meitetsu Tokoname Line, and from Tokoname Station to Chubu International Airport Station on the Meitetsu Airport Line.
There are three types of trains you can drive, each with their respective section: The Meitetsu Series 3500 train run between Meitetsu Gifu Station and Jingumae Station; the Meitetsu Series 2200 train run between Jingumae Station and Chubu International Airport Station; and the Meitetsu Series 2000 train run through all sections.

This game is compatible with Zuiki's Densha de GO!! dedicated one-handle train controller for the Nintendo Switch.

name: Life After End
description: Life After End is a harsh and cruel representative of the Survival Horror genre, where you have to survive in post-apocalyptic Siberia. Be prepared for harsh climatic conditions and realistic gameplay.

name: Just Wak and Beats
description:
Fangame for "Woowakgood", based on "Just Shapes and Beats"

Are you ready to embark on a rhythmic and colorful adventure? Introducing Just Wak and Beats, the electrifying fangame inspired by the mesmerizing world of “Woowakgood” and the adrenaline-pumping gameplay of “Just Shapes and Beats”. Get ready to groove your way through an epic journey in search of lost colors and ancient artifacts!

Prepare yourself for a gameplay experience like no other. Just Wak and Beats seamlessly combines the high-octane action of bullet hell games with the addictive allure of rhythm-based mechanics. As Wak navigates through the beat-infused landscapes, deadly obstacles will come at him in sync with the pulsating soundtrack. Dive, dodge, and dance your way past walls of sound, explosive boss battles, and heart-pounding crescendos.

name: Mickey in the Great Outdoors
description: Mickey In The Great Outdoor is a educational game was released for Atari 8-Bit.

name: Minecraft: Dragonborn Mash-up
description: The Dragonborn meets Minecraft in a clash of epic proportions. Build your own worlds in the land of Tamriel and experience adventure with many of its most iconic characters. Fus Ro Dah!

name: Fazbear Entertainment: Storage
description: Fazbear Entertaintment: Storage is a total revamp of Fazbear's Fright: Storage. New characters, new mechanics, a new story, and more. Taking place in the large gap between FNaF 1 and FNaF 3, FE:S seeks to merge somewhat seamlessly with the existing FNaF story, while also filling in a few gaps.

name: Nightstars
description:
Nightstars is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan-game developed by Bonzee & Co.

It's a short one night game focusing on reaction times and prioritisation skills. Expect some twists, fresh mechanics and more!

name: Amogus.io
description: Capture territories on a giant arena in Among Us as iconic impostors and crewmembers.

name: Fredbear and Friends: Left to Rot
description:
With the assistance of a private investigator through your handheld radio, you sneak down into the depths of Fredbear's Family Diner—seeking out clues for the whereabouts of your son and prime suspect of the case, William Afton.

However, unforeseen traps have been set within the facility. Will you be able to escape?

name: Ellie's
description: Ellie's is a more traditional fan game with elements of old and new while still being different. ELLIE'S was also built on the formula which permeated FNAF 1 through Sister Location. Investigate Ellie's, gather evidence of the past and the paranormal, and show your findings

name: Bubba's Diner
description:
You're the handyman of the brand new Bubba's Diner! Expect the unexpected!

Bubba's Diner is a FNaF-Based game with inovative mechanics and, of course, a dense backstory.

name: Sulfur
description: Sulfur is a modern old-school action-adventure: Outsmart enemies, find treasure, improve weapons, harness powers. Delve deeper, find answers, make it end.

name: Apart of Me
description:
Apart of Me is a multi-award-winning therapeutic game. It was co-created by experts in child psychology and bereaved young people, and translates bereavement counseling techniques into a magical 3D world.

You will be transported to a beautiful, peaceful island where you will meet a variety of friendly creatures. You will be given a guide to support you along your journey. Your guide will help you to explore, accept, understand and articulate your experience of grief and the wide range of emotions connected to it. As you progress through the game, you will discover your own strengths and wisdom. The island is a safe place where you can begin to process your grief at a pace that suits you, remember the person you have lost, and hear from others who know what it is like to lose someone you love.

name: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Gold Coin Edition
description: In this edition you get the game as well as a gold coin gamecase!

name: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Gold Edition
description: New Super Mario Bros. 2: Gold Edition includes course packs 1-10, which were previously only available for separate purchase.

name: 2 in 1 Combo Pack: Sonic Heroes/Super Monkey Ball Deluxe
description: 2 in 1 Combo Pack: Sonic Heroes/Super Monkey Ball Deluxe is a video game compilation of two Sega titles, one of which is from the Sonic the Hedgehog series. It was developed by Sonic Team and released for the Xbox in 2005 by Sega.

name: Wai-wai de Q: Haru no Saiten Special
description: This season of Wai-wai de Q is comprised of 4 episodes.

name: Monsters & Memories
description: Monsters and Memories is an independently created, niche Fantasy MMORPG that harkens back to the classic MMO era of the late '90s and early '00s.

name: Wai-wai de Q
description: The first season of Wai-wai de Q (later called Satella-Q), comprised of 4 episodes.

name: Wai-wai de Q: Aki no Daikansha Matsuri!
description: The second season of Wai-wai de Q. It is comprised of 5 episodes.

name: Rainy Boba Cafe
description:
Tangy and fruity or sweet and milky? The combinations are endless! Today’s interactive game Doodle celebrates bubble tea, also known as boba tea and pearl milk tea. Honeydew, matcha, raspberry, mocha – no matter the flavor, don’t forget to mix in some bubbly balls made with fruit jelly or tapioca. Bubble Tea gained such popularity globally that it was officially announced as a new emoji on this day in 2020.

This Taiwanese drink started as a local treat and has exploded in popularity over the last few decades. Bubble tea has its roots in traditional Taiwanese tea culture which dates back as early as the 17th century. However, it wasn’t until the 1980s that the bubble tea as we know today was invented. As waves of Taiwanese immigrants over the past few decades brought this drink overseas, innovation on the original bubble tea continues. Shops around the world are still experimenting with new flavors, additions, and mixtures. Traditional tearooms across Asia have also joined in on the boba craze, and the trend has reached countries like Singapore, Japan, South Korea, and more!

Satisfy your craving and make a yummy cup of bubble tea in today’s interactive Doodle, which features Taiwan’s indigenous Formosan Mountain Dog as well as a crew of familiar Doodle characters!

name: Michael Jackson in Scramble Training
description: Michael Jackson in Scramble Training is a Sega AS-1 motion simulator game developed by Sega AM3 and manufactured by Sega. Starring popular musician and Sega collaborator Michael Jackson in the feature role, the game was released in March 1993, and was frequently installed in the company’s flagship arcade venues such as Joypolis and SegaWorld.

name: Quest for Moomoo
description: Help Kye find her plush cow! A strange visual novel RPG hybrid experience. A plush cow is involved.

name: Wobbuffet's Puzzle Pack
description: Wobbuffet's Puzzle Pack! was a Flash game on Pokémon.com. It was a jigsaw puzzle where the player put togther Pokémon-related images.

name: American Truck Simulator: Kansas
description:
Introducing Kansas! A U.S State that is home to a truly authentic cowboy culture and miles of land littered with wildflowers. Located in the Midwest of the USA, Kansas is known for its native grasslands, streams, abundant blue skies, and green grassland vistas.

Once considered to be the country’s agricultural heartland, "The Sunflower State" has managed to attract many large businesses and develop in other industrial areas due to its central location and convenient infrastructure for logistics operations. But, as the nickname suggests, nature is certainly doing very well to keep up with technological progress, as the state parks and vast prairies offer unique views with a marvelous atmosphere that will leave every trucker passing by with something to remember.

name: Furby Island
description: Your goal is to host a huge party on Furby Island by assembling the necessary equipment and paraphernalia, a process that entails a series of errands

name: 1 Bit Survivor
description: 1 Bit Survivor is an easy to play but difficult to master randomly generated rogue-like with stylized pixel art and survival horror elements. Fight to survive 28 Days of the Zed-pocalypse and save your pet Cat!

name: Big Nose and the Witchdoctor

name: Unblock the River
description: Unblock the River is a simple and addictive puzzle game. Move the block and let the river flow.

name: Burger Yum!
description:
Who is the best burger maker?
In this board card game, the players are burger makers. The players take orders from the waiters and ingredients from the supply. They put them all together on the dish. When all the ingredients are used up, the players discover which burgers were maked properly, and which were not. The players take back their orders for their improperly maked burgers so they can try again in the next round. After three rounds, the player who has delivered the most burgers is the best burger maker and the winner!

name: Pop Fruit

name: Twisty Board 2
description:
The first time was just a training ground. Now, the real fight lies ahead.
Alien warlords called the Q’Tath have decimated earth’s defenses.
As they spread across the galaxy, their rations ran low…
So they rounded up and imprisoned the people of Earth.
Now, the fate of the world rests on your shoulders.
Repel the Q’Tath from 5 new battlegrounds.
Free the prisoners.
Save humanity!

name: Fireflies

To survive In the deep, dark space, the fireflies must always reach out for the light! But it it’s not an easy task - lots of obstacles and enemies are in the way.
But do not have fear! We trust in you to guide these little friends to the truth.

description: Take control of the counter and serve food to all of the hungry customers! Make sure to complete their order in time, and in the correct sequence or risk ruining their meal. Earn cash to purchase new restaurants and increase your earning potential.

description: Virtual Bomberman is a cancelled game in the Bomberman series that was planned to be released for the Virtual Boy. It was scheduled to be released in February 29th 1996.

name: Kaepernick Football
description: Play as the clutch QB on the game-winning drive. Pass or run, every play counts with 60 seconds left. Can you make the big-time quarterback throws for the 4th QTR comeback?

description: "Nitro Rally Evolution" is totally inspired by the old classic arcade racing games of the 80's; great gameplay and perfect cars control system makes the game as the first 100% arcade rally racing game on your iOS Device!

name: Hobo: Life Business Simulator
description: The game allows you to live your virtual life started as an unknown hobo, achieve fame and even become a president of your country! One action in the game takes 1 game day. Every day your mood, health and satiety decreases. If the level of vital signs falls to zero, you’ll have 7 days to raise it, otherwise you will die. Return bottles, gain money!

name: Byte Rider
description: Introducing a dystopian, cyberpunk future of brave data-hackers, breakneck excitement, and breathtaking graphics…. Welcome to Byte Rider! Dodge and his sister Weave have hacked their way into a honeypot of data that threatens to be their last! Only you can save them from gun-toting hover-drones, vicious vehicles, and the surreal streets of Cyber City. Blaze your byte-cycle through a maze of madness, collect your data, and hack your way through this mind-bending adventure!

name: A Blocky Kind of Love
description: A fresh new take on a love adventure lets you pursue romance on a wild ride over land sea and air. Your object of affection needs to be won over. Do you have what it takes to win her/his heart?

name: Jumanji: Epic Run
description:
Welcome to Jumanji!
Once again, Jumanji is in peril. The sacred Falcon Jewel has been stolen, and it’s up to you to recover it.

Run from howling hyenas, climb mountains, avoid avalanches, free fall from deadly waterfalls, and defeat anyone in your way.
Avoid dangerous animals from the game, including rhinos, vultures, jaguars, and more ... watch out at all times!

name: Tennis Manager Mobile
description: Tennis Manager is back for the 2023 season with an updated tennis world tour and new goals and achievements! Become the best tennis manager ever! Build your own tennis academy, find the next tennis super stars and make your team of pro players climb the worldwide ranking. A game inspired by Patrick Mouratoglou, coach of Serena Williams!

name: Commander: Modern War
description: Experience the thrill of a modern conflict between two factions, as you outsmart your opponents in an epic game of strategy and cunning. Take command of your ground, air, and naval units and lead them to victory in the most immersive turn-based battle simulation. The battlefield awaits.

description: The main character Kaori is on a date boyfriend suggests that they go on a test of courage. The destination is an abandoned drive-in. They hear a noise in the ruins and stops. Is there already someone there?

description: Players will play as five different characters and experience five environmental theme scenes relating to sustainable palm oil, orangutan conservation, rainforest protection, etc. Players need to make a variety of choices through their own understanding, and reach different story endings.

name: Silent Hill 2: Streets of Rage
description: Streets of Rage: Silent Hill is a 2015 fan game developed by BoggyTheWorm using the OpenBoR engine. It's a beat 'em up that mixes Sega's Streets of Rage fighting game and Konami's Silent Hill horror game into one. This crossover uses several well-known characters such as James (Axel), Maria (Lisa), Angela (Blaze), Travis (Adam), Eddie (Bongo), Heather (Lucia from Final Fight 3), Pyramid Head, and Scarlet.

name: Super Stardust Portable
description:
Experience Super Stardust Portable originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

Defend five vulnerable planets from incoming danger as you explode into some manic shoot ’em up action. Take out entire space fleets across two exciting game modes: Arcade and Planet.

name: Connection Error
description: Amber, an employee at GlobalNet Solutions, does her every-day night shift job in the IT Department, most of it being in the server room. Though somebody is stalking inside the darkness...

name: Pirate Fighting Simulator
description: PFS is first person shooter game where you fight pirates with guns. There are also different game modes such as capture the flag and team death match.

name: Astroneer: Awakening
description:
Hello. I wanted to be sure you saw this. We will talk soon. Please pay attention when we meet. The task I have for you is very important.

You must finish all other priority missions beforehand. I will find you when you are ready. Do not worry. You will know when it is time.

name: Astroneer: Rails
description: EXO Dynamics is proud to introduce the brand new Rails System! The Rails System brings a new mode of transportation to Astroneer that excels at efficiency and convenience. Place rail posts to build out your rail lines, and then board the new railway vehicles for a hands-free transit experience. And unlike other vehicles, railway vehicles can travel autonomously, perfect for extending the reach of your automation network. But that’s not all: rail lines themselves carry both oxygen and power, making them an excellent way to connect together distant bases and excavation sites like never before!

name: Astroneer: Xenobiology
description: The Xenobiology Update features a new adventure where players embark on a narrative-focused mission across the solar system to discover the secrets behind the curious Galastropods.

name: Astroneer: Jet Powered
description: The Jet Powered Update contains new vehicles to speed up Astroneer’s traversal of land and air! Use the new Hoverboard to shred planet surfaces while your friends use the VTOL to scout from the lower atmosphere!

name: Backrooms: Surreality
description: Noclip into the backrooms and never get out. Explore several infinite levels of the backrooms and survive in an environment inherently hostile to any human. God save you if you hear something wandering around nearby, because it sure as hell has heard you.

name: Donkey Kong Land 2: Game Boy Color Edition
description: Donkey Kong Land 2: GBC Edition is a Game Boy Color conversion for Donkey Kong Land 2. It also adds the option to have the second Kong follow you and "New Kiddy Mode", which allows the use of Kiddy Kong as a third playable character.

name: Concrete Tremor
description: "Concrete Tremor" is a short experimental horror game about plastic explosives and soviet apartments, where the story is told from multiple perspectives.

name: Super Botte & Bamba II Turbo
description: Super Botte & Bamba II Turbo is a MUGEN based fighting game created by Giochi Penosi, a team known for creating controversial games. The game uses average Italian humor and features various characters from TV shows and politics.

name: Price for Freedom: Avarice
description: Is an erotic cRPG set in the shared Price for Freedom universe. Enter our world in the role of Redic, a man looking to move on from his past and start a new life in the free trade city of Kaldea.

name: TacticalDuty.io
description: TacticalDuty.io is a brand new 2D shooter game that contains really fun competitve gameplay!

name: What if Adventure Time was a 3D Anime
description: What if Adventure Time was a 3D Anime is a third person action adventure fan game, developed by Mike Inel.

name: Doka-chan no Onigokko
description: Doka-chan no Onigokko is a game of tag in which players collect chicks in a maze while running away to avoid being caught by Oni. The stage is cleared when all four chicks are caught within two minutes, but the game is over if you get caught by a Oni or run out of time. The gameplay is fast, although some mazes can be quite aggravating and some chicks quite elusive.

name: Satella-Q: Nenmatsu Jumbo Takara Quiz
description: A 4-part season of Satella-Q.

name: Prison Architect: All Day and a Night
description: All Day and a Night contains 8 new wardens, 8 new prison maps and 8 new plots to expand your prison experience and bend the rules!

name: NeuroSquad
description: Invent your own weapons in this sci-fi Roguelike shooter! Combine any weapon with any upgrade to customize your arsenal. Form a squad of holographic soldiers, redesign their guns too, and slay hordes of cybernetic enemies!

name: Halloween in Hollywood
description: Halloween in Hollywood is a romantic comedy Yuri Visual Novel and Dating sim. Play as witty writer Martina Alvarez as she manoeuvres her way around epic events on Halloween night as she rubs shoulders with Los Angeles elite to do what she can to get her screenplay produced.

name: Fliese
description: "Fliese" is a minimal logic puzzle game

name: Efpiyes
description: Efpiyes is a multiplayer first-person shooter with a built-in map editor that anyone can use.

name: Castle Rush
description:
You are having war as your neighboring country has been stealing things from your motherland.
You have to slide, drop and create box sets to fill up your inventory, show your power and make the enemy's army to change sides and win this battle!

name: Zen Games: Color Blocks Puzzle
description:
Color Block Puzzle by Zen Games is a simple puzzle game for phones and tablets. This game has been built for stress relief. No rush, no hurry - a simple color blocks puzzle with no score or time limit. In this version of Zen games we have added 100 levels from easy to difficult. The game can be played by all ages by just moving the multi color blocks to match adjacent color and find your Zen.
Color Block Puzzle will improve your logic, coordination and help you relax with a soothing music as you cross each level moving color blocks and matching them. We have designed this zen game with soothing colours and happy music with a thought of helping you unwind.

name: Unravel Lines Puzzle
description: Unravel all lines by moving the balls across the board! Level is completed, when no lines are intersected. Every level has one more ball or one more connection, which makes the game progressively harder. Use your imagination and concentration and unravel every single line!

name: Train Your Brain
description: Train Your Brain is a game that requires high concentration.

name: The Hacker 2.0
description:
The Hacker 2.0 is a turn-based strategy and puzzle hacking game set in a stylized virtual reality.
You'll use different hacking functions to complete missions in a clever way.

name: Switchboard
description: Spell, lock, adapt and outduel. Switchboard is a brand new word game that combines turn-based word play with a healthy dose of strategy and a little bit of luck.

name: Smurfs' Village
description: The evil wizard Gargamel and his ever present cat companion, Azrael, have finally found the Smurfs’ village and have scattered our lovable blue friends far and wide throughout the enchanted forest. Come along with familiar friends, like Papa Smurf, Smurfette, Brainy, Jokey, Greedy and the rest of the Smurf family, as they guide you on a family fun adventure to build a new forest village for the Smurfs to call home.

name: Slide Golf Mini
description: Are you ready for an incredible Mini Golf game? Slide Golf Mini is a 1-2 player golf game that offers two 18 hole courses a 19th hole versus mode and a Golf Shop with new balls and backgrounds. There is now a reward system for a hole in one and course scores. Can you set a course record?

name: Roto16
description: Roto16 is a 21st century update to the age old 15 puzzle. Rather than shifting pieces to an empty spot, instead choose a corner where 4 tiles meet and rotate around that point.

name: Swing Home Run
description: Sin descripción

name: DuoDuo
description: Just tilt your device to control the DuoDuo. Fall down through the holes and avoid getting squished at the top. Get scores by staying alive as long as possible.

name: Endless Mountain
description: Minimalist and intuitive controls: Tilt the phone to the left to turn left. Tilt the phone to the right to turn right. You don’t need to press any buttons! Really simple to play but giving you some really immersive sensations. This is not just another snowboarding game.

name: En Passant
description: En Passant is a light, clean and quite delightful chess game specifically designed to feel right at home on your gorgeous device. It offers a unique analyze mode, chess notations, themes, mood sharing, friendly sounds and stylish design.

name: FleetMaster
description: Batthe and sink your opponent's ships before they can sink yours! Fast paced single and multiplayer action with leaderboards and achievements powered by GameCenter.

name: MicroSoccer
description: MicroSoccer is a fun and challenging retro style football game.

name: Linum
description: Linum is a puzzle type game in which your goal is to Land Nodes on the Landing Points.

name: Ice Cream Mania
description:
Embark on a flavorful adventure with Ice Cream Mania!
Compete with gamers from around the world or enjoy single-player mode!
Line up and move 3 matching ice creams to clear the level and win.
Experience over 390 exciting stages and share your top score.

name: Dawn in the Air
description:
Become a Grand Master capturing ornithopters.
You have no idea which are the ornithopters?

name: Cubinko
description:
Your puzzle skills will be put to the test with this new match 3 game mode! Our exclusive ink blocks will expand your mind in ways you never imagined in this addictive puzzle game. Enjoy the satisfaction of fitting pieces perfectly into place, filling the board with an explosion of colors, and with an extremely fun design!
Are you ready to push your limits?

name: Cosmic Quandary
description:
Your goal in Cosmic Quandary is simple -- move the wizards so their spell paths avoid each other and obstacles on the board!
Puzzles are randomly generated so you'll never run out of unique challenges each time you play!
Play through 40 levels in Puzzle Mode to unlock new wizards, obstacles, enemies, game modes, and more! When you're ready, try your luck in Timed Mode to see how many puzzles you can complete before time runs out!

name: Best Word
description:
Best word is a turn-based word game played online with your friends and opponents all over the world.
It takes 30 seconds to learn, but 30 years to master!
The question is, do you have an enough prominent linguistic repertoire to shine, to win, to secure a place on the leaderboard?

name: Atomic Pursuit
description:
A nuclear war aproaches, the entire planet is in serious danger. The last hope of the mankind is the space.
Some countries are sending their first missions looking for a new planet to colonize.
Choose your side, try to go the far as you can and became a national hero.
Be careful, your travel will be plenty of dangers. Keep an eye on the oxygen levels of your spaceship and take care of asteroids, they´ll be your worst enemy.

name: Angry World War 2
description: Sin descripción

name: AlphaSwap
description:
Alphaswap is a original word game that combines the elements of a Spelling Game Meets Word Search into a fast paced game for one to thousands of players!
Play vs. The World - Single players can play against other single players in a massive game where everyone is getting the same board/letters.

name: Air Soccer Impossible
description: Sin descripción

name: 41m
description: Sin descripción

name: 13 Thieves
description: The devious smash hit puzzle game!

name: CGI: The Game
description: Step into the shoes of one of 7 real-life body scans of models from today's generation and take on robots aliens & monsters in this futuristic metaverse. Utilizing stunning computer-generated imagery plus a custom soundtrack, the CGI game offers an immersive and action-packed gaming experience.

name: Find the Bug
description: Find the different bug and tag him. Perfect game to learn the differences.

name: Pro Turkey Hunting
description: Experience virtual spring gobbler hunting at it's finest! Whether you are a turkey hunter that needs off season action or a game enthusiast that enjoys playing true to life hunting simulations 'Pro Turkey Hunting' is the fix you need. Game play centers around the four wild turkey sub-species residing in North America; easterns, osceolas, rios and merriams. Harvesting each sub-species is referred to as the 'Grand Slam' of turkey hunting. Get close to that gobbler and use your calls and decoy to lure him in. But be careful not to move too abruptly, these old gobblers have incredible eyesight! Challenge yourself and see if you have what it takes to earn the coveted 'Grand Slam'!

name: Online Open World RPG
description:
A game in the "Open World RPG" series!
This game's release is part of Breakthrough Gaming's "Bible Video Game Sundays"!

name: Tetris Arcade in a Tin
description: Tetris Arcade in a Tin is a hand held version of Tetris released by Fizz Creations in 2022. As its name implies, it is a portable game of Tetris contained in a tin similar to those used for Altoids mints.

name: Tetris Keyring Arcade
description: Tetris Keyring Arcade is a hand held version of Tetris released by Fizz Creations in 2022.

name: Tetris MicroCard
description: Tetris MicroCard is a credit card sized handheld Tetris game based on the Arduboy.

name: Micro Arcade Tetris
description: A full-size arcade game in an incredible compact credit card sized device.

name: Tiny Arcade Tetris
description: The iconic arcade game of the 80's in miniature form!

name: Donkey Kong Country
description:
The developers at Rare intended to develop a Donkey Kong Country game for the Virtual Boy, but it was cancelled. The development went only as far as simple platforming stage which was made using Donkey Kong Land's graphics and rat enemies from Battletoads.

It was previously misremembered by a developer to be an early version of Donkey Kong Country 2: Diddy's Kong Quest.

No real footage of the game was ever found, with mock-ups being found on the internet.

name: Galaxian3
description: A cancelled Virtual Boy port of Galaxian 3.

name: Genjin Show: Tobidase! VB Genjin
description: Genjin Show: Tobidase! VB Genjin is a cancelled game for the Virtual Boy.

name: Intercept
description: Intercept is a cancelled game for the Virtual Boy

name: Invincible Iron Man Gagaga-In
description:
Invincible Iron Man Gagaga-In is a cancelled “80’s giant robot fighting action game” for the Virtual Boy, that had been in development by Hudson Soft and the planning and contract development group Eighting. It was planned to release in Japan roughly a year after the system launch.

The game has never been officially announced, but images of a design document and an EP-ROM cartridge containing a sample build have been shared in 2018 by a former Hudson employee.

name: J.League 3D Stadium
description: J.League 3D Stadium is an unreleased soccer game for the Virtual Boy from J-Wing. It was slated for release in Japan on March 20th, 1996, but was ultimately cancelled when the Virtual Boy was discontinued. Not much is known about the game, as the only ever mention of it was when it was announced at Space World ’95.

name: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers
description: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers is an unreleased game for the Virtual Boy that appeared briefly on Nintendo Power’s Release Forecast lists in December 1995 and January 1996 with a release date of “Winter ’96”.

name: Tennis
description: Sin descripción

name: Kaboom!
description: Sin descripción

name: Barnstorming
description: Sin descripción

name: Grand Prix
description: Sin descripción

name: Sausage
description: Sin descripción

name: Turtwig's Target Smash!
description: Turtwig's Target Smash! is a game on Pokémon.com. The player controls a Turtwig who must smash targets using Energy Ball. Turtwig sits on a platform that is constantly moving up and down. Targets appear on a screen in various formations, and the goal is to destroy as many as possible with one attack. The player holds down the Energy Ball button, causing Turtwig to aim. Holding it down too long results in Turtwig's aim being locked in a near-straight line, so the player must release the button when the aim is satisfactory. The more targets hit, the more powerful Energy Ball becomes. After several sets of targets are destroyed, the player moves on to the next level. The entire game, including different levels, lasts 99 seconds. After the time is up, Turtwig destroys the remaining targets with Solar Beam, and the final score is displayed.

name: Pachirisu's Click-Clack Attack!
description: Pachirisu's Click-Clack Attack! was a Flash game on Pokémon.com. The player must send Pokémon discs into holes located at each of the four corners of the board to earn points. Which direction and the distance the discs are launched depends on the angle and force they are launched at. Each disc depicts a Pokémon. While these discs can be sent directly into the holes, if they hit another Pokémon disc in their evolutionary line, they will fuse together and evolve. If they hit an unrelated Pokémon, they will simply collide and knock each other back. There are also special rounds where certain conditions must be met, such as getting all the discs into the holes in one shot.

name: Play to Befriend a Pokémon!
description: Play to Befriend a Pokémon! was a Flash game formerly available on Pokémon.com. It was a Pokémon Global Link promotion. The goal is to break blocks with a bouncing ball, similar to Breakout. Players use the paddle to keep the ball from falling out of bounds. When the ball hits blocks consecutively, the score increases by 100 each hit. Sometimes when a block is hit, an orb of its color will fall. These orbs, when caught by the paddle, are worth 500 points each. There are 4 levels, and the player starts with 3 lives. They may earn more lives and power-ups later. After playing, the orbs caught, depending on what kind, can be used to redeem 1 free Pokémon via the Pokémon Dream World, provided the player is signed in under their Pokémon Trainer Club account. These Pokémon are Vaporeon, Jolteon, Flareon, Espeon, Umbreon, Leafeon, and Glaceon. The game was removed after May 19, 2011, and the .swf file for it was actually deleted from the site.

name: Squiggle Drop
description:
Solve puzzles by drawing a single shape.

Featuring 100 levels, each with a unique objective and requiring different types of problem solving skills.

name: Secret Diaries: Manage a Manor
description: Help Jane decide what she truly wants before it's too late!

name: Kindergarten Secret
description: Kindergarten Secret - detective, horror and puzzle in one game. You will be able to play as several characters in the frame of one game, complete twenty unique quests and uncover the main secret of the story.

name: Secret Dimension
description: Secret Dimension - a mind-bending platformer that will test your skills and keep you guessing. Master illusions, beat the clock and set new high scores.

name: Guacomole
description: GUACOMOLE is a classic arcade shooter with a twist... Survive endless waves of chip enemies with only one bullet. A seamless cross between classics such as Pong and Asteroids. Enjoy a challenging and strategical experience that will leave you hungry for more!

name: Prison Architect: Jungle Pack
description: Jungle Pack is an aesthetic pack that sets your compound in the deep and lush tropical forest. Far from civilization, you will need to manage your inmates while dealing with the dangers of nature. Do you think you’re up for this task?

name: Refund Me If You Can: Lexy's Story
description:
Welcome to Lexy's Story, a challenging 3D platformer set in the year 3030.

In this game, you must help Lexy's grandmother by retrieving her medication within two hours.

But be warned, this game is not for the faint of heart. With permadeath, ragdoll physics, and no save feature, you will need to rely on your skills and determination to overcome the obstacles on your path.

name: Memories
description: Memories is a sapphic visual novel dress-up game where clothes are linked to painful memories of a failed relationship.

name: Extra Case: My Girlfriend's Secrets
description: Your girlfriend seems to be hiding something. Will you respect her privacy or pry into her secrets? Don't worry, though. This is a horror dating sim with a time loop, so you can try again...and again...and again...

name: Pop Survivor
description: Pop all balls in the level before you rush to the goal, in under 60 seconds. You need to jump, run, avoid obstacles to successfully clear each level. Make sure to efficiently pop balls or else, you won`t be able to clear levels in time!

name: Sex with Teachers
description: Sex with Teachers - is the simplest puzzle which can help you to develop your visual memory and enjoy hot pictures of sexy ladies.

name: Waifu Packer
description: Waifu Packer is puzzle game where you try to fit tiles into boxes by moving them around on a grid. Each level you unlock an image of a beautiful waifu which will be waiting for you in the gallery!

name: Living with Temptation 1: Wild Weekends & Wife Gone Wilder
description: Erotic RPG game about relationship and desire. Help Tracy with the household chores, take care of your baby, earn money and spoil her with your kindness. Rediscover the pleasure of sex and have kinky experiences with her.

name: Only Furry 18+
description: Only Furry 18+ is a casual clicker adult game that looks like a popular social media.You should help main character to earn enough money to make a post. After every reached goal you will get a beautiful 3D picture or awesome 3D animation with girl.

name: Jam Above Jam Below
description: Witz and Doobz on their adventure to make a video game through seven different mini-games and funny cartoon cutscenes!

name: Biblios Dice
description: Biblios Dice is a digital adaptation of the dice game by Dr. Finn. In it you are working as medieval monks to produce illustrations and improve the prestige of your abbey. Manipulate the value of the five different resources, buy and sell at the market, and gain the bishop's favor.

name: The Backrooms: Nightmare Dimension
description: The Backrooms: Nightmare Dimension is a Co-op online horror game with up to 4 players, where you and your friends take on the roles of soldiers who are part of the SCP Foundation with the mission to eliminate the mysterious entities found in the infamous place called "the Backrooms".

name: Super Smash Bros. Infinite
description: A mod for Super Smash Bros Brawl by Bromageddon and friends, that includes a ton of characters, costumes and stages.

name: Cute Bully Nyanbaba
description: The super cute villain Nyanbaba is back! This time, meow bully invaded 10 new scenes, found all the strange hidden points and cracked the magic of cat ear Nyanbaba! Contains jump out shock (cute)! And super cute Chinese dubbing! More scenes, more voice, more joy!

name: Whackerball
description: Whackerball is a twin-stick shooter roguelite with Breakout inspired mechanics. Use your paddle to keep your ball airborne and dodge enemy bullets as you defeat waves of enemies.

name: Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles
description: Enjoy the next verse of Marl Kingdom adventures with Rhapsody II: Ballad of the Little Princess and Rhapsody III: Memories of Marl Kingdom! Join Kururu, the daughter of Cornet and Ferdinand, as she pursues her dreams of true love, and experience these classic RPGs in full forte as they take center stage! With improved visuals, a heart-warming story, a charming soundtrack, and an emotional conclusion, Rhapsody: Marl Kingdom Chronicles comes ready to win your heart as it makes its welcome western debut!

name: Banjo-Kazooie: The Hidden Lair
description: Banjo-Kazooie: The Hidden Lair is a passion project by Daveyx0 and Oldum77. It shows a possible continuation of the series, with possible events after Banjo-Tooie. It features a new area of the original Grunty's Lair that acts as the main hub, called the Hidden Lair.

name: EdoPro
description: A Yu-Gi-Oh multiplayer card simulation updating game available for download on Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android. A fork of the YGOPro client.

name: CosmiBall 3D
description: Sin descripción

name: NekoBop
description: Sin descripción

name: Apes vs Helium
description: Apes vs. Helium is a game that was made in 2020 and is a first person shooter based off of the tower defense game series Bloons TD. In the game you play as the unique monkeys that appear throughout the series, starting off as the Dart Monkey. You begin upgrading your weapons, changing classes, and buying extra support to help you along the way.

name: Striving for Light: Survival
description: Striving for Light: Survival brings the exploration of infinite expanding skill trees to the arena survival roguelite genre. Unlock new characters, weapons, skills and maps, slay hordes of monsters and take on massive boss fights.

name: Hyper Pop
description: Hyper Pop is a frantic action rogue-lite bullet heaven. Use your mouse cursor to guide and protect your character as it grows to become absurdly overpowered against hordes of cute emojis!

name: Zombie Balloon Heads
description: Your task is to shoot the zombies in this 2D platformer with simplistic doodle art style. Plays from the browser with a flash player.

name: Strikers 1945 II for Nintendo Switch
description: Sin descripción

name: Sift Heads 3
description: Vinnie is out to get some revenge in the third episode of this mafia noire stickman puzzler, the Siftheads series.

name: Shanghai Summer
description: Shanghai Summer is an adventure game set in the millennium. Our protagonist, Baichuan, goes through a series of "anomalies" over the length of twelve days. In his pursuit of the truth, he found that his hopes and regrets from the past finally seem to converge. Will he be able to "fix" it for good?

name: Party Maker
description: Builder. Designer. Renovator. Unleash your creativity in over a dozen unique places, get the right equipment, prepare the space, use what you find. Wanna make a crazy party?

name: Zombie Balloon Heads 2
description: Fiends, zombies and enemies of a stickly kind are here to ruin your day. No chance! Blast their hollow heads until they fill up with ink, and watch their skulls explode. Delightful! Travel through history and time, meeting and destroying lotsa zombies. Inky hilarity ensues! Second installment in the Zombie Balloon Heads series.

name: Arena of the Mad King
description: Arena of the Mad King (AotMK) is a fast-paced bullet-hell boss rush game. Touhou meets Realm of the Mad God.

name: Zombie Balloon Heads 3
description: Johnny's back in school, and he loves History class! Third game in the Zombie Balloon Heads series of short platform shooters.

name: I Commissioned Some Bees: 12 Days
description: The brief was simple. Artists were commissioned to create a fantasy Christmas/winter world, and hide as many bees as they can inside it. Now it’s your job to find them all! With 15 art pieces to choose from, and 1500+ bees, you will have a lot of searching to do.

name: Super Mario /v/orld: New Vegas
description: The hackers on steroids known as 4chan return! Super Mario /v/orld: New Vegas is the third installment of 'Super Mario World' collab hacks from the /v/ board. From May 1st 2021 to June 24th 2021, 94 levels were submitted. As with previously, SM/V/3's goal was to make fun and well designed levels themed around the absurd, disgusting and somewhat beautiful nature of the anonymous imageboard. Player Discretion is advised.

name: Gravity
description: Gravity is a challenging, physics-based puzzle game. Move yellow objects around then turn Gravity on. If the red ball reaches the exit when everything falls, you win. Simple right?

name: Farming Fever
description: Farming Fever is an engaging time management game where you can become both a farmer and a chef at the same time. You'll have to manage your farm, harvest crops, cook, and complete customers' orders.
